question: Which of the following authors wrote Tarikh-i-Firuz Shahi?
explanation: Ziauddin Barani is the author of Tarikh-i-Firuz Shahi in 1359 CE. It is an important historical source for the Tughlaq dynasty, with detailed accounts of the reigns of Ghiyasuddin Tughlaq, Muhammad bin Tughlaq, and Firuz Shah Tughlaq.
